src:
Soal Curi Gol Ronaldo, Aaron Ramsey: Ini Insting Saya
07 Nov 2019, 17:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang Juventus Aaron Ramsey mengaku ia mencuri gol Cristiano Ronaldo karena didorong oleh insting alias nalurinya untuk memastikan bola melewati gawang lawan.
Juventus bertandang ke markas Lokomotiv Moscow pada matchday 4 Liga Champions, Kamis (07/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Pertandingan itu berjalan alot bagi pasukan Maurizio Sarri.
Namun mereka bisa mencetak gol cepat di laga itu. Pada menit ketiga, Ramsey mencatatkan namanya di papan skor.
Ia mencocor bola di garis gawang. Namun bola itu sendiri sebenarnya berasal dari tendangan bebas langsung Ronaldo.
Tendangan pemain Portugal itu tak bisa ditangkap dengan sempurna oleh kiper Lokomotiv, Guilherme Marinato. Bola lepas dari tangannya kemudian bergulir ke gawang.
text:
About Stealing Ronaldo's Goal, Aaron Ramsey: This Is My Instinct
Nov 7 2019, 17:20 by Bola.net
Soccer - Juventus midfielder Aaron Ramsey admitted he stole Cristiano Ronaldo's goal because he was driven by his instincts alias to ensure the ball passed the opponent's goal.
Juventus travel to Lokomotiv Moscow headquarters on Matchday 4 Champions League, Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. The match was tough for Maurizio Sarri's troops.
But they can score fast goals in that fight. In the third minute, Ramsey listed his name on the scoreboard.
He leaks the ball in the goal line. But the ball itself actually came from Ronaldo's direct free kick.
The Portuguese player's shot could not be captured perfectly by Lokomotiv goalkeeper, Guilherme Marinato. The ball is released from his hand and then rolled to the goal.
